name: The Pagemaster Online Quiz | P | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT one of the three tests that Richard had to take?
Three alumnas from 'Star Trek' were in this movie. Can you name one of them?
questions.correct: Patrick Stewart & Whoopi Goldberg & Leonard Nimoy
questions.explanation:
Patrick Stewart & Whoopi Goldberg & Leonard Nimoy.

	Patrick Stewart played Adventure, Whoopi Goldberg was Fantasy, and Leonard Nimoy was Dr. Jekyll.

questions.text: Who did Richard and his friends see when they escaped from Dr. Jekyll's house?
What was Richard afraid of most of all?
Who was the captain of the ship that Richard became cabin boy on?
When Horror was taken captive by little people, what story was that supposed to represent?
What book did Richard use when he defeated the dragon?
What phrase was repeatedly repeated by the Pagemaster to Richard?
options: Not good. Definitely not good at all.

questions.text: Which one of Richard's possesions did the books value the most?
